body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Environmental Factors               Environmental Factors        NPS Photo: Dave Hays      Environmental factors important to El Morro include air quality, climate change and weather events, and our dark night skies free of "light pollution" from urban centers.           Night Skies The dark night skies at El Morro are unlike anything you can see in an urban area, but need protection. More->         Weather & Climate El Morro has highly variable weather, and climate trends influence many factors. More->
